content: In 2025, the tightly monitored city of Stenograd unravels after its enigmatic engineer, Marek Halden, dies under mysterious circumstances, leaving its all-powerful Behavioral Compliance Index in disarray. As glitches ripple through the city’s systems, a public square suddenly broadcasts Halden’s cryptic handwritten diary entries, each eerily predicting citywide disturbances, pulling crowds into frantic attempts to decode hidden warnings. Fear and hope mingle as protest assemblies surge and the BCI’s grip slips. When citizens who vanished from the system’s watchlists begin reappearing, evidence surfaces of Halden’s secret “Reconciliation Protocol” meant for their return. Revelations spark hope and fury: Council factions feud, some pushing brutal crackdowns, others proposing reforms. Yet, when manipulative ‘reconciliation’ statements are exposed by returnees, mass protests explode, and the citizens of Stenograd finally demand genuine reform and accountability from the shadows of their automated city.
